A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
If you have not yet gone to see this movie and you are a Star Wars fan don't go. Disney needs no more of our hard earned money. This movie destroys pretty much everything Star Wars wars stands for.

this movie is very disjointed\, has broken/pointless main plot lines\, it opens up huge gaping holes in not only episode 1-6 but also episode 7. Every single main charachter is walked back from where things ended with TFA. 

Every male charachter is disrespected with the script and made to be weak or a buffoon. I am not sure why someone's politics are showing in this movie and only the women get to be nice\, noble and heroic. I'm guessing Kathleen Kennedy and whoever else is responible for this script has something to do with it.


We sci-fi lovers have always treasured strong female rolls in our Star Wars and many other sagas you get the feeling watching this that the writers didint even bother to watch any of the other 7 movies\, and they certainly did not pick up a book. Characters like Mara Jade come to mind and I had hoped to see characters like her in a future movie.

I have lost all hope for the future....
